movies.Title: Chuck
movies.Actors: Zachary Levi, Yvonne Strahovski, Joshua Gomez, Vik Sahay
movies.Plot: When a twenty-something computer geek inadvertently downloads critical government secrets into his brain, the C.I.A. and the N.S.A. assign two agents to protect him and exploit such knowledge, turning his life upside down.
movies.Awards: Won 2 Primetime Emmys. Another 7 wins & 32 nominations.

movies.Title: It
movies.Writer: Chase Palmer (screenplay by), Cary Joji Fukunaga (screenplay by), Gary Dauberman (screenplay by), Stephen King (based on the novel by)
movies.Actors: Jaeden Martell, Jeremy Ray Taylor, Sophia Lillis, Finn Wolfhard
movies.Plot: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.
